1.5.name: wordpress/payease-payment
1.5.description: Admin, authors can sell products/services by publishing a post with a custom field named "Price". Parameters for delivery method and PayEase ( PayEase is an Internet Payment Gateway for for Chinese currency - CNY ) can be configured on "Payment Setting Page" under admin role. Admin role can access all order records on "Orders Page". Authors role can access their own orders on "Orders Page".
